Package com.BrickBreaker.element.brick

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
com.BrickBreaker.element.brick.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, DiamondBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
This is an abstract Brick class to store the variables to generate different types of brick in game
Since:
3/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alden Sia Zheng Heng

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size, java.awt.Color border, java.awt.Color inner, int strength)
      The Constructor of Brick Class Assign the parameter to the variable
      Parameters:
      name - The name/type of the brick
      pos - The location of the brick generated
      size - The size of the brick
      border - The GameBorder
      inner - The color to fill the brick created
      strength - The strength for the brick

  • Method Details

    • repair

      public void repair()
      Repair the bricks that broken when game reset

    • impact

      public void impact​(int ScoreObtain)
      To determine whether the brick is broken and pass the score
      Parameters:
      ScoreObtain - The default score obtained when the brick is broken

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int dir)
      To check for the impact occur in the game
      Parameters:
      point - The location of the current brick
      dir - The direction of the ball
      Returns:
      False if the brick is broken, True if the brick is not broken

    • findImpact

      public final int findImpact​(Ball b)
      This method will find the impact point where the ball hit the brick
      Parameters:
      b - The object of the Ball class
      Returns:
      The point to bounce the ball

      the shape of the brick
